sentence.Network_en: Sri Lankans share a common ancestry with their Indian brethren.
sentence.Network_cn: 斯里兰卡人和他们的印度兄弟有共同的祖先。

sentence.Network_en: There is enormous, acknowledged and untapped potential in the Indian stock markets.
sentence.Network_cn: 印度的股票市场蕴含着巨大的、公认的、尚未挖掘出来的潜力。

sentence.Network_en: He tensed as the big West Indian gripped his shoulder.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个大块头西印度群岛土著人抓住他的肩膀时，他浑身紧张起来。

PerfectNetExp.abs: The Indian Ocean is on the south of Asia.印度洋位于亚洲南部.

entry.tran: 印度的;印度人的;印度文化的
entry.def: Indian means belonging or relating to India, or to its people or culture.
An Indian is an Indian citizen, or a person of Indian origin.

example.ex: ...a study of Indians and Pakistanis living in Southall.
example.tran: 对生活在绍索尔的印度人和巴基斯坦人的研究

entry.tran: 印第安人(现在通常称作Native Americans)
entry.def: Indians are the people who lived in North, South, or Central America before Europeans arrived, or people related to them. The usual name for them now is Native Americans .

example.ex: The South American Indians have been cooking and eating potatoes for well over two thousand years.
example.tran: 南美印第安人烹调食用土豆已有2000多年的历史了。

means.word_mean: 1. a member of the race of people living in North America when Europeans arrived
2. a native or inhabitant of India
3. any of the languages spoken by Amerindians
1. of or relating to or characteristic of India or the East Indies or their peoples or languages or cultures;
2. of or pertaining to American Indians or their culture or languages;

auth_sentence.res_content: It has a long coastline on the Indian Ocean.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It has a long coastline on the Indian Ocean.

auth_sentence.content: Even many Indian courts disallow the testimony it produces.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even many Indian courts disallow the testimony it produces.

auth_sentence.content: We have a unique thing being of Indian background.

Sentence.sentence: People from broken homes and North American Indians are two examples.
Why did white settlers introduce alcohol to Indians
As the Indian economist Amartya Sen has wisely said, "The invisible hand of the market has often relied heavily on the visible hand of government.

sentences.en: a restaurant that serves traditional Indian dishes
sentences.cn: 提供传统印度菜的餐馆

sentences.en: Dyewood is a dense Indian hardwood.
sentences.cn: 染料木是一种硬质印度产硬木。

sentences.en: The Indian Ocean is on the south of Asia.

sentences.cn: 玉蜀黍又称为印第安玉米。

sentences.en: America was once the home of many Indian tribes.
sentences.cn: 美洲曾经是许多印第安部落的故土。

sentences.en: Annie took out her drawing pad and pencil to dash off a sketch of the Indians.
sentences.cn: 安妮拿出画本和铅笔,迅速地画了一幅印第安人的素描。

sentences.en: Early explorers traded directly with the Indians.
sentences.cn: 早期的探险家直接跟印第安人进行交易。

sentences.en: Baltimore washed out the Indians’ six-game win streak with an 8-3 win.
sentences.cn: 巴尔的摩队以8 :3结束了印地安队连赢六场的好运。

sentences.en: By living a blue moon with the Indians,he was assimilated to them in his thinking and actions.
sentences.cn: 由于长期和印第安人共同生活,他在思想和行动上都被他们同化了。

means.word_mean: 小阳春；晚秋的晴暖天气

sentences.en: We had a splendid Indian summer last October.
sentences.cn: 去年十月，我们度过了一个十分美妙的小阳春。

means.word_mean: 垂暮之年的成功(或幸福)

sentences.en: He made his best films in his seventies; it was for him a real Indian summer.
sentences.cn: 他七十多岁拍出自己最好的电影，真是垂暮之年又回春呀。
